database.name: VIEW SMSP_ORDER_SUPPLIERS_V
database.view: SELECT c_order.c_order_id AS smsp_order_suppliers_v_id, c_order.ad_client_id, c_order.ad_org_id, c_order.isactive, c_order.created, c_order.createdby, c_order.updated, c_order.updatedby, c_order.issotrx, c_order.documentno, c_order.docstatus, c_order.docaction, c_order.processing, c_order.processed, c_order.c_bpartner_id, c_order.c_costcenter_id, c_order.dateordered, c_order.grandtotal FROM c_order WHERE c_order.issotrx = 'N' AND c_order.docstatus = 'CO'
